Text:
Downloading it now. When done will seed 3 copies.
Enjoy guys. Thanks!
Any ETA on the Linux version? Really appreciate you uploading these, but a Linux version would make my day.

I'll try to get out a Linux version. But I'm not sure how popular it will get to get enough seeders to keep it alive. I'll try later today but the upload speed from me will be slower than normal because I have to do a lot of stuff.

I'd throw a linux copy on my seedbox. Please upload!

Thanks.

Probably just as many folks wanting the Linux version -- at least the ones that care about the performance. It'll always run faster on Linux vs the other platforms just due to the architectural differences of the OS.
